public class XMLFileDataItem
extends FileDataItem
implements Cloneable

This class represents a shared Gridella file.

Constructor Detail

XMLFileDataItem

public XMLFileDataItem()
Creates a new empty PGridP2P data item.

XMLFileDataItem

public XMLFileDataItem(GUID guid,
                       Type type,
                       Key key,
                       Peer peer,
                       Object data)
Creates a new PGridP2P data item with all parameters.

Parameters:
guid - the unique id.
type - the data type.
key - the key for this host.
peer - the inserting peer.
data - the data.

XMLFileDataItem

public XMLFileDataItem(GUID guid,
                       Type type,
                       Key key,
                       PGridHost host,
                       int qoS,
                       String path,
                       String name,
                       int size,
                       String infos,
                       String desc)
Creates a new PGridP2P data item with all parameters.

Parameters:
host - the storing host.
qoS - the QoS of the storing host.
key - the key for this file name.
path - the file path.
name - the file name.
size - the file size.
infos - the extra informations for this file.
desc - the file description.
